story.title: The Abode of God in Miniature
paragraphs: The Golden Temple stands at the intersection of spirituality and architectural mastery. Built in the late 16th century, Harmandir Sahib's gilded dome rises above the sacred Amrit Sarovar (Pool of Nectar), creating one of the world's most recognizable silhouettes.

Our miniature captures the temple's defining features: the stunning gold-plated dome with its inverted lotus crown, the four entrances symbolizing openness to all, and the marble causeway that bridges the terrestrial and the divine.

Every proportion follows the original's sacred geometry—from the square sanctum to the rectangular pool, from the ornate balconies to the copper cupolas. We've even preserved the subtle asymmetries that give the structure its living, breathing character.

items.question: What is the significance of the Golden Temple?
items.answer: The Golden Temple (Harmandir Sahib) in Amritsar is the holiest Gurdwara of Sikhism. Built in the 16th century, it stands in the middle of a sacred pool (Amrit Sarovar) and represents equality, with doors open in all four directions welcoming people of all faiths. Our miniature captures this iconic structure with architectural precision.

items.question: What finish options are available?
items.answer: We offer three premium finishes: Classic Gold (standard - inspired by the original gilded copper), Antique Bronze, and Polished Silver. Each finish is hand-applied to create an authentic, lustrous appearance. You can also request custom finishes through our contact page.

items.question: How long does production and shipping take?
items.answer: Each Golden Temple miniature is crafted to order in 7-10 business days. Standard shipping takes an additional 5-7 days, while express shipping takes 2-3 days. We provide tracking information and updates throughout the entire process.

items.question: Is the reflection pool included?
items.answer: Yes! The miniature includes the surrounding Amrit Sarovar (reflection pool) and the marble causeway leading to the temple. The entire composition captures the complete architectural ensemble that makes the Golden Temple so iconic.

items.question: Can this be used for religious purposes?
items.answer: While our miniatures are architectural models created with deep respect for the sacred significance of these structures, they are designed primarily as decorative art pieces and collectibles. Many customers use them as inspirational focal points in their homes or offices.

items.question: What if I need a custom size?
items.answer: We love custom commissions! While we offer Standard (15cm) and Large (25cm) sizes, we can create larger or smaller versions based on your needs. Contact us through the 'Request Custom Design' button or email us directly to discuss your requirements.
